#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int s(long int,int);
int main()
{
    int i,t,sum;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        long int a,b,k,d=0,p,l;
        scanf("%ld%ld",&a,&b);

        if(a%10!=0)
            k=(1+(a/10))*10;
        else
            k=a;
        if(b%10!=0)
            l=(1+(b/10))*10;
        else
            {l=b;
            d+=s(l,0);
            }

        d+=(l-k)*4.5;
        for(i=a;i<k;i++)
            d+=s(i,0);
        for(i=b+1;i<l;i++)
            d-=s(i,0);

        printf("%ld\n",d);
    }
    return 0;
}
int s(long int i,int sum)
{
    int p;
    while(i)
    {
        p=i%10;
        if((p&1)==0)
            sum+=2*p;
        else
            sum+=p;
        i=i/10;
    }
    return sum%10;
}
